title: Any RAW photo taken has a resolution of only 378 x 672 (0.3MP) Camera in 16:9 mode.
content: RAW pics are small at 378x672 (0.3MP). Trasferring to desktop Win 10 PC and opening in Faststone  Photo Viewer they look small. These small resolutions happen in both 4:3 and 16:9 modes. Any advice appreciated. Cheers.
